properties.name: pattern comparison task
properties.alias: NIH Toolbox Pattern Comparison Processing Speed Test
properties.definition_text: This test measures speed of processing by asking participants to discern whether two sideby-side pictures are the same or not. The items are presented one pair at a time on the computer screen, and the participant is given 90 seconds to respond to as many items as possible (up to a maximum of 130). The items are designed to be simple so as to most purely measure processing speed.
